Package com.sidparikh.advent.solutions

Class Day04

java.lang.Object
com.sidparikh.advent.Solution
com.sidparikh.advent.solutions.Day04
public class Day04 extends Solution
Day 4: Giant Squid

We're gonna play bingo with a very scary giant squid.
Star One: Find the board that's going to win first. Calculate its winning score.
Star Two: A much more intelligent strategy: let the Squid win. Find the board that is guaranteed to lose. Calculate its winning score.

  • Method Details

    • getFinalScore

      public static int getFinalScore(int[][] board, int lastNum)
      Calculates the final score of a bingo board, defined as the sum of the uncalled numbers times the last number to be called (ie the number that made this board win).
      Parameters:
      board - the bingo board to check
      lastNum - the last number to be called
      Returns:
      the final score of the given int[][] board

    • isBoardWinner

      public static boolean isBoardWinner(int[][] board)
      Checks if a bingo board is a winner, as defined by having a full row or a full column of MARKs.
      Parameters:
      board - the bingo board to check
      Returns:
      true if the given int[][] board has a full row of column of MARKs, false otherwise

    • createBingoBoards

      private void createBingoBoards()
      Parses the input and sets up nums and boards.

    • partTwo

      public String partTwo()
      Finds the board that will win last.
      Specified by:
      partTwo in class Solution
      Returns:
      the final score of the losing board when it finally wins (12738)
